short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pizza Search transforms your searching experience into an adventure while utilizing Microsoft Bing Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pizza Search is the ultimate Chrome extension crafted for pizza enthusiasts and casual browsers alike. This dynamic tool transforms your web searching experience into a flavorful adventure, specifically designed to elevate your search discovery journey while providing the Microsoft Bing Search Engine at your convenience.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing The Pizza Search extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your Chrome New Tab search engine to Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://pizzasearch.store/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy: https://pizzasearch.store/privacy-policy/

Contact: https://pizzasearch.store/contact/

About: https://pizzasearch.store/about-us/
